name: FURRY GIRL PUZZLE
detailed_description:
FURRY GIRL PUZZLE - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and open the pictures with furry girls.

You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the next level.

Admin Mode:

  • R - reload level
  • E - fast open the level if you are in the menu.
  • Q - reset the level to 1.

Features:

  • Simple controls (mouse)
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Beautiful furry girls.
  • Gallery.
  • 15 pictures.
  • Steam achievements.

Credits:

  • Programming: AFBIK Studio
  • Music and effects: zapsplat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Use headphones for better experience!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10
  • Processor: Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Use headphones for better experience!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. This game is not a pornographic product, so there are no scenes of coition.  The main function of the game is to solve puzzles. 
After completing level you take reward - the opportunity without censorship to enjoy the aesthetics of the beautiful female body created by artist in the style of "Nude (Art)" and Furry (Art). 
The all characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.
